trans-unit.source: Establishes a <see cref="P:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlTextParser.Normalized" /> property for use by the .NET Framework infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 建立要讓 .NET Framework 基礎結構使用的 <see cref="P:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlTextParser.Normalized" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: You should not implement the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlTextParser> interface in your code.
trans-unit.target: 您不應該實作<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlTextParser>程式碼中的介面。

trans-unit.source: Instead use the <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.Normalization%2A> property of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader> class.
Gets or sets whether white space and attribute values are normalized.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定泛空白字元 (White Space) 和屬性 (Attribute) 值是否會正規化。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if white space attributes values are normalized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果泛空白字元屬性值會正規化，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: You should not implement the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlTextParser> interface and <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlTextParser.Normalized%2A> property in your code.
trans-unit.target: 您不應該實作<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlTextParser>介面和<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlTextParser.Normalized%2A>程式碼中的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Instead use the <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.Normalization%2A> property of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader> class.
Gets or sets how white space is handled when parsing XML.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定剖析 XML 時要如何處理泛空白字元。

trans-unit.source: A member of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.WhitespaceHandling" /> enumeration that describes how whites pace is handled when parsing XML.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.WhitespaceHandling" /> 列舉型別的成員，其中描述剖析 XML 時要如何處理泛空白字元。

trans-unit.source: You should not implement the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlTextParser> interface and <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlTextParser.Normalized%2A> property in your code.
trans-unit.target: 您不應該實作<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlTextParser>介面和<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlTextParser.Normalized%2A>程式碼中的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Instead use the <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.Normalization%2A> property of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader> class.
